package.name: BetterCam
package.shortDescription: iPhone 11 Camera features for iPhone X

descriptionlist.description: BetterCamX adds the iPhone 11 Camera Features to iPhone X
iPhone 11 Pro Zoom and Flip Control. Depth and Intensity Control with High Key Mono.
Thanks to lilacvibes_ who helped implement the different zoom levels.
iPhone X running iOS 13.4 or later
